file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Example API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
  description: Example
  contact:
    name: Example
tags:
  - name: user
    description: user
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8080'
paths:
  /tasks:
    $ref: ./paths/tasks.yml
  /my_tasks:
    $ref: ./paths/my_tasks.yml
  /signin:
    $ref: ./paths/signin.yml
  /signup:
    $ref: ./paths/signup.yml
